attributes.action: SAVE KIRKHAM and St.ANNES SWIMMING POOLS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The only public swimming baths in South Fylde  are under threat AGAIN from the beancounters at Fylde Borough Council who "know the price of everything and the value of nowt".
Local children have very little to do,
especially in Rural Fylde and closing the baths will not only deprive them of a worthwhile sports/leisure facility but also put their lives at risk by stopping swimming lessons. Priority must be given to positive life skills and good health rather than financial restraints.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "SAVE KIRKHAM and St.ANNES SWIMMING POOLS."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15197.asp

Prime Minister's Office
